## Introduction

Generate $x\sim Unif(-2,2)$, $y\sim Unif(-1,1)$, fit a lm to x,y.



```{r}
n = 1e4
x = runif(n,-2,2)
y = runif(n,-1,1)
lm(y~.,data.frame(x=x,y=y))
```

Now rotate the points by 45 degree


```{r}
library(rearrr)
datax = data.frame(x=x,y=y)
new_datax = rotate_2d(datax,45,x_col = 'x',y_col = 'y',origin = c(0,0))
plot(new_datax$x_rotated,new_datax$y_rotated,xlab='x',ylab='y',col='grey80')
lm(y~.,data.frame(x=new_datax$x_rotated,y=new_datax$y_rotated))
lines(new_datax$x_rotated, 0.600406*new_datax$x_rotated-0.005416)
abline(h=0,lty=2)
abline(v=0,lty=2)
```
